Early Access Review
Finally a real fighting game!Heavy Impact is a great take on boxing in VR. The game really shows how powerful room-scale tracking is and makes jumping around seem natural. When fighting, the robotic opponent acts how it should. It reacts and counters very nicely and doesn't let the player win with a cat-fight. Every blow is real and by extension the fights are too. While the game is in early access, there are very few bugs in sight. Heavy Impact could become one of the best VR fighting games.
